name: Impossible Tic-Tac-Toe
description:
Classic Tic-Tac-Toe made impossible due to the computer's smart counter-move every turn.

Point of this app:
- Trick, frustrate or troll your friends/family
- Learn how to master tic-tac-toe
- Teaches you sometimes you will fail a lot, but the important thing is you learn from your mistakes
